intro: Breweriopsis elegans, commonly known as the elegant breweriopsis, is a flowering plant belonging to the family Apiaceae. It is characterized by its finely divided, fern-like leaves and small, clustered white flowers. Native to the southwestern United States and northern Mexico, it thrives in arid and rocky environments. The plant is often found in dry, open habitats such as grasslands and disturbed soils. Its botanical features make it an interesting subject for ecological and horticultural study.
